title: The Stalker's Obsession
description: An innocent girl.A reclusive billionaire.One fateful collision.She bumped into me on the street, and now I'll never be the same. I'm obsessed with everything about her, and now I can't stop watching her. She's innocent and all alone, and I'll do anything to protect her. Even if that means I have to watch her from the shadows.
author: Emma Bray
